name: Diced and Confused
description:
Made in 48 hours for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam; Theme: "Roll of the Dice"

Play as a lil'dude trying to roll dice onto the right number at the right spot. Tricky puzzles will test your box pushing abilities.

Controls -> WASD/Arrows:Move | R:Restart | esc:Menu | Accept/Enter:Select(Menu)

Thankyou Jack for playtesting my game, and helping me make it better!
